attributes.action: Electrify the Birmingham Snow Hill Lines and Chiltern Main Line
attributes.additional_details: The Snow Hill lines in the West Midlands are currently diesel operated, as well as the line operated by Chiltern Railways to London Marylebone, leaving Marylebone as the only London terminus station unelectrified. Electrification would not only benefit tens of thousands of rail users, but benefit the economy, creating new jobs and investment as well as providing an improved and faster rail service.
